item.title: Jim Butcher on Men vs. Women
item.description:
I'm reading Jim Butcher's "Cold Days", his latest installment in the Dresden Files, and I felt the need to share this quote:

So, ladies, if you ever have some conversation with your boyfriend or husband or brother or male friend, and you are telling him something perfectly obvious, and he â€¦
item.dc:creator: Michael P. Soulier
